Summary: Bright white light floating down and hovered for 1 min and then went straight up at light speed!
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Antelope
There were no other sightings in Antelope on or around February 1st 2011
divs: sighting detailsi was standing in front of my home with my dogs and i looked up to see a single light up object coming down at a slow speed and it finally stopped and hovered in one place for about 1 min . then it took off faster than anything i have ever seen. missles can not fly that fast. this was from earth to the stars in a 1\2 second. i have researched for months . i want to know whatnot was ! please help
